body_html:
@skye Thanks for the invitation. Seriously. My only (but, large) hesitation is that my C/++ is very rusty. I've only gotten back into a little recently to mess with the TF JNI code. I need to think about this.

I had two issues with TF_AddGradients.

  1. missing gradient implementations
  2. not handling the case where a variable is used by more than one op node

body:
@skye Thanks for the invitation. Seriously. My only (but, large) hesitation is that my C/++ is very rusty. I've only gotten back into a little recently to mess with the TF JNI code. I need to think about this.

I had two issues with `TF_AddGradients`. 
1. missing gradient implementations
2. not handling the case where a variable is used by more than one op node
